project_abstract.cdata: The project seeks to:  (a) improve health and safety of Belize City dwellers; (b) preserve the rich ecology of the city and its environs, one of the most important assets of the country; (c) promote economic development of the city, in particular provide a boost to tourism, the fastest growing industry in the country; and (d) strengthen city capacity for infrastructure maintenance and delivery of urban services.  The project provides for:  (a) rehabilitation of street network and traffic management; (b) improvement of the drainage system including canals and creeks; (c) coastal protection and berth facilities; and (d) strengthening the city's capacity to maintain its infrastructure and improve the delivery of urban services.
